message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would significantly benefit your operations. I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10800. This offer is designed to help you maximize value while staying within your budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
